mdRecord.dcterms:title: West Virginia: The Rand-McNally Vest pocket map of West Virginia, showing all counties, cities, towns, railways, lakes, rivers, etc
Rand-McNally Vest pocket map of West Virginia
Vest pocket map of West Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rand McNally and Company.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Map has title "West Virginia" with "Rand, McNally & Co.'s New business atlas map of Virginia and West Virginia" in small type below the bar scale.
Inset: Northern portion of West Virginia on same scale.
List of West Virginia railroads overprinted in red.
Sheet includes portions of adjoining states, but only West Virginia is colored.
Index to chief cities printed in left margin, with index to counties, creeks, mountains, rivers and towns and a list of West Virginia electric lines printed on verso.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Folded into original brown paper covers. With marginal tears. Contains manuscript annotations.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Cover is glued to verso of the map, obscuring a portion of the index text.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Railroads--West Virginia--Maps.
Electric lines--West Virginia.
West Virginia--Maps.
